page.title: 15OLD SCHOOL,NEW SCHOOL.
page.content: {NEW SCHOOL_ OAKLEY CROSS PRIMARY {SCHOOL,WEST AUCK- LAND,as seen by {Michael Fenwick,age 9. Our school is a junior mixed and infant school.It was built in 1978.It is an open plan school.The main doors lead into the entrance hall.Next to the entrance hall there is a staffroom and an office.There is a store room too.Then there is a big hall,a dining area and a kitchen where the food is cooked.There are some infant toilets and some junior toilets.We have a play room,2 infant areas, 2 junior areas,a study room and a library.We have a quadrangle where we grow flowers.We have a garden,too.We have 2 play- grounds,one infant and one junior playground.We have a playing field and some flower beds,too.
